metadata.title: CVE-2024-24474 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: QEMU before 8.2.0 has an integer underflow, and resultant buffer overflow,via a TI command when an expected non-DMA transfer length is less than thelength of the available FIFO data. This occurs in esp_do_nodma inhw/scsi/esp.c because of an underflow of async_len.

criterions.comment: qemu package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
